root.name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse
root.description: Overview The Devil's Playhouse is an episodic series which consists of five episodes. They are:Episode 1: The Penal ZoneEpisode 2: The Tomb of Sammun-MakEpisode 3: They Stole Max's BrainEpisode 4: Beyond the Alley of the DollsEpisode 5: The City That Dares Not SleepEach episode was released monthly by Telltale starting with The Penal Zone in April 2010 and ending with The City That Dares Not Sleep in August 2010.Collector's DVDOn August 31st, 2010, Telltale detailed the bonus content available on the Collector's DVD. It includes:PC and Mac versions of all five gamesPackage art by Steve PurcellTrailersScreen shotsWallpapersConcept artOuttakesA highlight reel with developer commentaryFuture Vision TV Commercials Skun-kap'e's Secret OriginGamepro's "History of Sam Max" video series The Collector's DVD is available for free (plus shipping costs) to anyone who purchases the full season from Telltale's website.System RequirementsPC System Requirements OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7Processor: 2.0 GHzMemory: 1 GBGraphics: 128MB DirectX 8.1-compliant video cardDirectX: Version 9.0c or betterSound: DirectX 8.1 sound deviceMac System RequirementsOS: Mac OSX 10.5 or laterProcessor: Intel Core 2 DuoMemory: 256MBGraphics: Not recommended for Macs with integrated graphics
